name: Plagued Minds
description:
Set in a historical period, develop medicine for plague victims in order to find the cure.

Plagued Minds was created at the end of our first year of learning game development and was made over 21 days by 2 designers, 3 artists and 2 programmers.

This project still needs some major polish and will be slowly, but surely, continually updated. Our plans for the necessary fixes can be found inside the downloadable zip.
